title: Quranic Treatment BD
description:
I am Gazi Mo Tanjil. BSc Civil Engineering.
I am not a Hafiz or Alim. However, I have done a few courses on Quran and Quranic Arabic language. I am currently a student of Naish Madrasa. In the oligarchy of our society, people are being deceived by going to fake magicians called Tantrics, Kabirajs, Vaidyas, Khanas and spending millions of rupees.
.
So now I have left the civil engineering profession and for the last 3 years I have been engaged in the service of the people by doing Rukiyah Shariah and Hijama. My wife and I have taken training in Hijama Helpline and Bangladesh Holistic Healthcare from doctors and experienced Hijama therapists. And I have learned Rukiyah from many Raki brothers, by reading books, watching videos of outside Rakis and from the sheets of Sheikh Khalid Al Hibshi.
.
Rukiyah and hijama services are mainly used for waswasa, badanjar, magic and jinn and other physical and mental problems.
.
In the last 3 years, many people have recovered from the problems of waswasa, badanjar, magic and jinn asar and many patients have benefited from the rukiyah and hijama services. Al-Hamdulillah.
.
We sell Rukiyah and Hijama as well as Rukiyah supplement products such as honey, olive oil, pure honey, etc.
.
My organization's page name is Quranic Treatment BD
Website www.quranictreatmentbd.com
I also have a Facebook group: Name: Quranic Treatment Group BD -Quranic Treatment Group BD
.
Location of our Rukiyah Chamber:
Shialbari, Mirpur 2A, Dhaka 1218.
Contact number for advice / help
0173 951 361 (Just call / message live from 7pm to 9pm directly or on WhatsApp)
